name: Hyve Managed Hosting
tagline: The Fully Managed Cloud Hosting Company
description: Mission-critical cloud hosting for business with a special focus on exceptional security and full management services. Hyve engineers become an extension of your business, involved right up to the application layer including performance tuning, database management and even source code support. Hyve are PCI DSS, ISO27001 certified and G-Cloud accredited. Hyve provide solutions for small and large-scale businesses, with clients including Tesco, TKMaxx, RSPCA and British Airways.
